description:
A man is repaid for an accidental gift, but greed ruins all, an old couple sponsors a rat, and two kids trick a sneaky priest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hi Otoko / Nezumi no Sumou / Oshou to Kozou no Pupupatapata
The Fire Man / Rat Sumo / The Priest and the Kid`s Pupupatapata
火男 / ねずみのすもう / 和尚と小僧のぷ~ぷ~ぱたぱた
